name: Sticks N Stones
description:
W, A, S, D for movement. 

R to restart.

If you land outside the play area it will auto restart. 

Goal: Reach the end. (There are  currently three levels, it loops around for endless play.)

Can you make it without touching one of platforms? Knock down all the yellow sticks? Avoid touching anything? 

The goal area (pillars at the end) will eventually lead to a new level with new obstacles. This is my first, ever, game level so it is just a proof of concept and trying out Itch upload. Thank you for playing.
